name: despatch: Entity Astray
description:
Immerse yourself into a thrilling VR Escape Room Game


A blackout leaves you at the mercy of a strange and hopeless situation. Place and reasons for your presence are unknown. Discover unfamiliar environments, study the surrounding mechanics and find out who you are in order to escape the deadly scenario.

"despatch: Entity Astray" is a combination of Sci-Fi adventures and experimental Escape Room Games. Impressive AA graphics, detailed environments, futuristic effects and a complex level design make “despatch” a remarkable gaming experience. Developed and optimized for Virtual Reality, “despatch” creates an immersive VR experience. By completely entering the dystopic situation, you become one with the protagonist’s journey.

Several solution approaches and environmental storytelling bring refreshing versatility to the gaming experience. Start your VR adventure now and bring light into the unknown darkness.

LORE and Meta on our website


On our LORE and Meta website you can dive deeper into the “despatch” universe and find out more about the story, news and the development of future products.
